Sentencas: To enable the development of next-generation solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs), the fabrication of dense and defect-free diffusion barrier layers via constrained sintering has been a significant challenge.
Titulo: Fabrication of dense and defect-free diffusion barrier layer via constrained sintering for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Here, we present a double layer technique that enables complete densification of a defect-free gadolinia-doped ceria diffusion barrier layer.
Titulo: Fabrication of dense and defect-free diffusion barrier layer via constrained sintering for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this approach, top and bottom layers were individually designed to perform unique functions based on systematic analysis of constrained sintering.
Titulo: Fabrication of dense and defect-free diffusion barrier layer via constrained sintering for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The top layer, which contains 1 wt% CuO as a sintering aid, provides sufficient sintering driving force via liquid-phase sintering to allow complete densification of the film, while the bottom layer without a sintering aid prevents detrimental chemical reactions and regulates the global sintering rate to eliminate macro-defects.
Titulo: Fabrication of dense and defect-free diffusion barrier layer via constrained sintering for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Such fabrication of dense diffusion barrier layers via a standard ceramic processing route would allow the use of novel cathode materials in practical SOFC manufacturing.
Titulo: Fabrication of dense and defect-free diffusion barrier layer via constrained sintering for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Furthermore, the strategy presented in this study could be exploited in various multi-layer ceramic applications involving constrained sintering.
Titulo: Fabrication of dense and defect-free diffusion barrier layer via constrained sintering for solid oxide fuel cells
